website_summaries.verdict: Well-built and efficient fan with versatile clip mount, although some buyers note that it dies fairly quickly.
pros: Available in a variety of colors
Uses little power and runs quietly
Strong clip is useful for mounting this option anywhere
cons: Some felt this model isn't that strong and doesn't blow out enough air
Reports of fan shorting out after a couple months

customer_reviews.title: Best personal fan ever bought
customer_reviews.text: The absolute BEST personal fan I have bought. My work will NOT allow us to plug anything other than our docking stations and monitors into the outlets...strange, I know. So, this fan plugs right into my USB port and is clipped to the bottom of my monitor. I bike ride to work and after taking a shower there, this fan is great at cooling me down. I keep it on the high setting for about an hour, then switch to low. If you are looking for a quiet and powerful fan, I HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: g0tr00t

customer_reviews.title: Great for an aquarium!
customer_reviews.text: I use one of these to cool my 20 gallon hexagon aquarium. It is plugged, via a USB power adapter, into a Inkbird temperature controller to automatically turn it on/off as needed. When switched on high speed the fan can, through evaporative cooling, drop the water temperature about two degrees in ~90 minutes. The fan is absolutely quite. The fan clip easily attaches to the rim of my tank which many aquarium cooling fans can not do. I have the fan aimed to blow air across the water surface NOT down into the water.
customer_reviews.author: TexasAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality, good air movement, quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Previously ordered two battery-run fans for my camping, not wanting to use any energy from my solar set up unnecessarily, but they were so cheaply made it was clear they would not last long; one lasted about 5 mins and stopped working. So when someone recommended this online, I decided to try it. It's SO much better put together. Clip is super strong, quality of the plastic is way better, and I'm glad I have it for my next SUV camping trip. Tested how much it pulled from my solar charge controller, and it was pretty minimum; well worth it to me to have some air moving in my tent or car at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kayle Simon

customer_reviews.title: ...insanely useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this quite a few months ago and use it pretty much daily, it makes very little noise even on the #2 setting and I've clipped it in a few places (even in the car when the AC fan wasn't working during a couple very hot days) and it's insanely useful. At some point I need to grab a couple more. Also, if you need to clean the blades off (we have a bit of humidity here and a lot of dust, we live off a mostly dirt driveway) I can suggest q-tips with alcohol on em, just stick it right in between the slats, while it's off of course!
customer_reviews.author: Casper Moody

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, quiet, and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these units with anticipation that they would work in two different environments. The first is part of my computer/game system. With heavy graphics there is some heat build-up that this quickly remedies. The use of the USB power source helps with aesthetics greatly. The second application is probably unique. I have the second unit mounted in my golf cart plugged into the USB port to keep my wife cooler. When it is 90+ degrees and a heat index of 95+, this unit generates a nice breeze that is well appreciated. Great Product. You have to look to see if it is on, because it is silent during operation, at either speed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Good value, very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, very quiet, perfect for a desk. This unit has a decent breeze up close. It's very quiet as well. I had planned for this as white noise while sleeping when camping and it is very quiet. It will work perfect at my desk at work, plugged in to my pc without annoying my neighbors. The low speed is almost worthless, you can barely feel it. But high seem decent and can move air a few feet away. Again, perfect for a stuffy office without annoying any cube neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: HowieZ

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. Its clipped on to the edge of my nightstand. It puts out a decent amount of wind for its size, and I enjoy the slight him while I'm trying to sleep. It works great. Even bought another for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG Best Fan EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little fan EVER! I run miserably hot all year 24/7 so having air on me is essential. Hard part is constant noise and positioning. THIS fan is whisper quiet, feather light, 2 speeds for perfect output, is ridiculously adjustable like a car mirror, you can point air with precision and being a clip-on with USB charger it goes anywhere & everywhere. It creates a sustain state of comfort with the perfect breeze of island beach. Yeah, yeah it's just a dumb fan, but for me, when you find one like this it is not just a fan, it is indispensable.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Nice breeze for my RV!
customer_reviews.text: Our motorhome came w USB ports on shelves above our beds & I bought these to move air around when we are no hooked up to electricity. The clamp allows you to place it in many different locations & the two speed fan puts out a nice breeze & draws very little juice from the house batteries. Would have given it 5 stars except the protective fan grill cover fell off upon opening it from the box & uses tiny, tiny screws like on eyeglasses to reattach.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: keep me cool when work's A/C just doesn't cut it on those ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work where I work as a customer service rep. This fan is extremely quiet and does what it's intended to do, keep me cool when work's A/C just doesn't cut it on those hot days. I will say the sound is a little more noticeable on high versus low speed, but low speed has been sufficient for my needs so I can't say if high speed would be a distraction for my job.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Falk

customer_reviews.title: Portable and Useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, low-power-draw, portable fan. I sleep with a box fan at home, so I actually take this camping and run it from an Anker powercell. It is very quiet though, so I have to set it pretty close to my head. It’ll go all night on high and not use a dot on my charge indicator. Bonus... It can also be used to provide oxygen to a fledgling campfire, and keep you from burning your face off. ;)
customer_reviews.author: LC's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my work desk. I work close with others that get cold, so the thermostat goes up and I switch this on and it's been great. I clip it on the side of my monitor and I am confident it is going to be sturdy and strong enough to not fall off. If you have room to place it on your desk, it would probably be perfect too. Low setting is nearly silent. High setting makes noise but I would not call it loud.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: We clip this to my kids’ bunk beds. They each have one on they’re own side. Not too loud, but just enough sound and breeze to help them fall asleep
customer_reviews.author: RubyLee

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and quiet
customer_reviews.text: This little fan is awesome. I've got it clipped to a Veridesk and it fits great. Its usb plugged into one of my monitors so no trouble at all when in the standing position. I keep it set to low and it's not loud while actually pushing a respectable amount of airflow. I havent had any comments from folks hearing it while in webex meetings or on phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Tinroofer

customer_reviews.title: I use it to blow warm air from my pellet stove to my living room. The gentle warm breeze is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not for blowing cool air but to help me get warm air from my pellet stove to one little cold spot I had between rooms and this fit the bill perfectly! This little fan blows just enough. I don’t like the corner fans because they are big and bulky and you’ve got cords everywhere what I liked about this was the cord was very thin and the fan is kind of cool looking so I have it just clipped onto a little shelf and it’s kind of inconspicuous and now I’m warm as toast all over.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our camper
customer_reviews.text: We have had this fan for only a few days, but it's great so far. We tried smaller USB fans, but this one is better for our camper's small bed nook. The most important feature? It's very quiet (on low) while providing a steady breeze. The wide clip keeps it securely in place. We have it clipped, upside down, to a shelf above the bed. The 2 swivel points let us aim it exactly as needed, and so far it has held it's position. The long cord makes it easy to reach a power source. We use it on low overnight, but it's not even that loud on high. So far it has been perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Champine

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan to use at work. I'm in a shared office where some people like to keep it too warm for me. I plug it into one of the USB jacks on my computer. It's small but moves the perfect amount of air. The low setting is almost silent, and the high setting is still very quiet. The fan itself doesn't really make any noise, just the sound of the air on the blades. If you purchase one, it'll be money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Sigurros

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok
customer_reviews.text: The best & most important feature is that the fan ran by usb. The air output is about a 3/5 stars. The clip has a fairly wide base but doesn't open super far, I was not able to clip it to the edge of my desk; instead, I had to clip it the the edge of my monitor. Thus causes some visual disturbance from the pressure, which went away when I released the clip & not recommended for long use. It is tight enough to stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Noisy fan😕
customer_reviews.text: I like this fan a lot! It’s small and compact. The only thing I don’t like is that when it is on the low setting it does not cool me down as much and when it’s on the hot setting which is like duh right? I use this fan for sleeping and the noise can be loud on the high setting. Basically this fan is just annoying with the noise. Yes it could be louder but it does not work super well for sleeping because it does not have enough settings.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Really nice little fan...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much honestly, but this was a pleasant surprise. I have it clipped on to the corner of my flat screen monitor and plugged into a USB hub on my power strip. Has 2 speeds, both move the air really nicely in a personal space. Isn't loud at all. The one thing I haven't looked at just yet is how easy it's going to be to clean. Inevitably the blades will get dusty and i'll have to take the front off to clean them, but other than that I recommend this if you have a limited amount of space ...
customer_reviews.author: Todd Young

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for small fans that run on DC power to ventilate my tool shed/workshop. Most of the USB fans I saw online were very small. This one was a bit larger so I gave it a try. I was pleasantly surprised by how much air it moved. And it draws very little current, which is important to me since I'm running it off of a 12 V solar + battery system. I purchased two more after my initial trial and am very happy with them. I've only had them for about two weeks so can't comment on durability, but performance is great for a $20 fan.
customer_reviews.author: David Barndollar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our rv to personalize our air flow. I like more, hubby likes less. It's quiet, clips on easily to multiple objects, and can be pointed easily to the area you want. Our dog loves his too! He is happier with the air flow when we drive. This is a wonderful and versatile product.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for travelers that like a light breeze
customer_reviews.text: I like a fan on when I’m sleeping but that’s a challenge when I’m traveling so I tried this out. It’s small so I wasn’t expecting a typhoon but it got the job done. Clipped it to the drawer and plugged in to my adapter (not included). It survived undamaged in my suitcase. No internal battery so no TSA issues.
customer_reviews.author: SF Giants Fan

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and low power consumption
customer_reviews.text: I stayed in a cabin with a wood burning stove and since I had the top bunk, I knew I’d be warm. I hooked this fan up to a 20,000mAh power brick on low and it ran all night and only drained the battery about 20-25%. It was quiet and sounded almost like white noise. It kept me cool And helped keep the wood burning stove smell from being overwhelming. Can’t wait to take it tent camping in the summertime.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Roku stick
customer_reviews.text: The nemesis of any Roku device is heat. This little fan is perfect to clip to the back of your tv and aim at the Roku to keep it cool. It has a high and low switch and either setting moves a good bit of air, certainly enough to keep your device cool! You can plug it into a 5v USB port on your tv and it will shut off when you shut the tv off. I highly recommend this fan, that's why I have 3 of them!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Zang

customer_reviews.title: Super sophisticated plus practical
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed and very quiet. On low speed, it is hardly detectable. The clasp disappears once it's installed and the adjustments let it blow in any direction while not using table-top space. Neatly made. The description mentions use on a "stroller" and this gave me the impression that it would be baby-room suitable. Sure and it is, but it is also super cool looking and not at all "baby-roomish."
customer_reviews.author: Harbor Square

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT desk fan
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size to be effective and also be placed at one of a number of locations on my desk. Most of the time, I tend to run it on the low setting...that seems to be just right unless it's really hot. Great little fan. Glad I found it! Update: I liked it so much, I bought two more for other locations. Great little fan!
customer_reviews.author: Just another Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great little fan! Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It didn’t come up on my extensive searches for fans, a friend who has one sent me a direct link. I needed one that would be running on a regular basis, so battery powered ones were not an option. I have it clipped to the rack at my workstation so it it slightly above my head. The 2 speeds are great- low is barely audible but moves the air just enough, and high is a little louder but is quite breezy. Definitely would recommend for anyone in a similar position.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This one is ACTUALLY good!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this fan to put in our camper and it works great. Produces a nice breeze, the noise level is really low on 1 and makes a perfect ambience noise on 2. We had it plugged in all night, every night for a week and it never wore out our camper’s battery. The USB amperage is great for a camper. We are totally buying another one today, no joke. Wish we were getting paid or got free product for this review but damn, we didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet, super cute
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a godsend! It's little and cute, but performs really well. My hubby gets hot super easily so he needs a fan at his desk but the noise usually drives me crazy. This thing is nearly silent and I sit within 3 feet of it. I normally don't even know it's on. Buying another for my sister who gets airsick on planes if not enough airflow. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Katie F.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Effective
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can plug this fan into my laptop wherever I am. It's quiet and has lots of power. The clip is not very wide but strong, but I don't have to clip it to something in order to use it. It does well standing on its own. The only drawback is that there are only two speeds - either high or low. I would like to be able to fine tune the amount of flow. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Schnepel

customer_reviews.title: Love this tiny workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I purchased several small fans-ALL have broken-Except this one? Has been going strong 24/7 since my purchase-I love that it is attractive and easily placed near bathroom and kitchen where moisture can form-I even washed it to clean it-and no problem-I own 3 now-
customer_reviews.author: Blissguru

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting a fan that used batteries for power. This one ios powered through a USB cable.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a fan that used batteries for power. This one ios powered through a USB cable. I used a rechargeable battery source to power the fan. The fan has two speeds and works great for me. I mostly use it clipped on the handlebar on a spin bike. It moves air real well. I would have given five stars but I was disappointed that I had to provide electrical power for the fan other than batteries and had to purchase a battery source.
customer_reviews.author: tosibasharp

customer_reviews.title: Great fan , Great size !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan to use in my car. The a/c is not working and thought it would help, it didn't! It only circulated the heat in the car. However, the fan works wonderful and feels great. It's not a noisy fan, so it's great for your desk. It only works with USB a plugin. I love the size of it. I may consider repurchasing as a backup when the power is out. Battery fans are kind of expensive. I just couldn't afford to keep it right now, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Africa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for RVs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my RV. I have a 12v fan which is loud and clumsy. This fan is neither loud nor clumsy. This is the best fan I've ever owned. It is almost silent and easy to attach. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great for the car
customer_reviews.text: I used this for car camping. I wanted to be able to keep my car windows closed at night. This helped circulate air so it wasnt so stuffy. I just clipped it to a ceiling handle in the back seat of my car. It also was nice when I would go for a hike with my dog. When we would get back to the car it would help him cool down.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fan
customer_reviews.text: I returned the item because I was comparing so many items, I failed to notice that this one does not have a battery and must be plugged it at all times, which was not going to work for my purposes. That being said, I did try it out before sending it back. Seemed like a very nice inexpensive fan with very decent airflow for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Stars

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give this four stars because I thought it was a bit weak, but then I realized there was a second speed setting! It turns out the button on my fan is a bit stiff so I hadn't realized if I pushed it a bit harder I'd get another setting. Very good for personal use at the computer, nice and quiet and clips perfectly to my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Kae Winters

customer_reviews.title: Meh🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: Not much air circulation from within 1 feet. I clipped it right next to my bed but minimal air flow. I guess it's good for the sound since some people find the sound soothing to sleep. Meh. I bought another version that's USB and battery operated with much better result. Buy for the sound but not for air flow.
customer_reviews.author: Louise of 3

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other portable fan!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t bother to write reviews unless something truly impresses or disappoints me. This is one of my best Amazon purchases of the year. I’ve bought other small fans that were much more expensive. They didn’t put out enough air. This fan is perfect for my bedside stand bc my husband gets cold and I’m always hot.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Seaton

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: The fan is a good buy for its intended purpose. I wanted to use it as a fan in a golf cart. Its clip mount facilitated that purpose nicely. Unfortunately the fan was not powerful enough to provide the circulation I needed in Florida. Hopefully the vendor will do so soon. I will be their first customer.
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary Man

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this at least 1000hrs now, and no issues. Good airflow for a USB fan. Don’t expect Dorthy snatching winds out of a USB powered fan and you’ll be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: william vogel

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fan to attach to my elliptical when I workout. I love the USB port and in the photo you can see the long cord . I gave a three star for travel because it’s plastic and could break. If you need white noise, the “high mode” could be higher. I think it’s worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooling down axolotls tank
customer_reviews.text: I use this to cool down my axolotls 20g long tank. My room sits at about 70 -73 and this fan can cool the tank down to about 62-66. On average I would say it will cool your tank down 6ish degrees if you have it blowing across the surface. The huge clip allows the fan to stay sturdy on framed tanks and also has other adjustable features. It is also very quite on the low setting and still pretty quite on the high setting. I’ll update with pictures of my fan set up later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Portable with strong motor
customer_reviews.text: Could feel a decent breeze within 3 feet at high setting. At low setting I would use it to cool a gaming laptop. Sometimes i connect it to a portable usb charger and it last hours where there is no electricity. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: JaCol

customer_reviews.title: Second best friend on hotter days
customer_reviews.text: Battery: just use in the AC power Durability: use almost every night on power mode... so far, so good! No strange noises, still works as new... Versatility: the wind is compatible with the blade sizes; The clip works fine so you direct it to every direction you need...
customer_reviews.author: Raphael Sekine

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my coworker who used to have a battery operated fan. This one is usb and plugs right into her computer. She loves it. The fan is quiet and powerful. It was also bigger than I expected however still smaller than most. (this isn’t a riddle)
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Versatility and air circulation awesome Keynice great product.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a small fan I could use at home attached to my laptop table and this won hands down. It has two speeds the higher a little noise but not bad and you get plenty of fresh air. The clip is strong and the fan mount moves in many directions as you would need. Plug right into a USB port of my laptop and away I went. Great little fan for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Linane

customer_reviews.title: Great for boat
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my Ranger Tug, to help defog the windshield on the driver side. The humidity is high here in the Pacific North West. The accessory power outlets for the tug are all the 5 volt USB versions so this fan was perfect. Also it has a clip that grips the ledge above the window so I it's not in the way. At the high speed setting, it cleared a spot about 2 feet in diameter. I liked it enough that I bought a second one for the passenger side windshield.
customer_reviews.author: bob orca

customer_reviews.title: Great things in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not expecting much, but it really delivers. I use this at work and have limited desk space. Its small size and quiet power keeps me cool enough to refrain from assaulting co-workers. I love it and am glad I took a chance on it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Our office has meeting rooms that you could easily bake cookies in when the sun is at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Our office has meeting rooms that you could easily bake cookies in when the sun is at the right place. This little angel is 100% USB powered (no-batteries that run out) so I just plug it into my laptop and go to every meeting with it. I am the only one that is not completely dying of heat. I LOVE this fan!!!
customer_reviews.author: uzirider

customer_reviews.title: I like it so much I’m buying a couple more.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the RV but found it to be perfect in the baby’s room for air circulation. Will be buying a couple more for the RV and a spare for my husband’s office.
customer_reviews.author: erma payne

customer_reviews.title: Works Great to Cool Daughters Top Bunk in Summer
customer_reviews.text: Love that it reaches the top bunk of my daughters bed however there cord could easily be twice as long & that would be even better! It keeps her cool while she sleeps & keeps our electric cost down (can keep the AC at a higher setting) because she's using this fan to keep her cool and we have a similar USB fan in our bedroom. It does make a slight whirring noise so it could be a little quieter but nothing too annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Karmela C Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Good idea. Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Versatile with the USB plug. I take it camping and use it with portable batteries when camping. Not noisy. Low speed right next to my head is all I need when sleeping. Can also plug the USB into a wall socket converter at home. Both speeds are perfect for different needs. It is a personal fan so it needs to be close to you. Don't expect it to cool a room. No complaints. Does the trick for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Not portable
customer_reviews.text: This seems like it made cheaply it also shocked me that u can not run the fam unless it is plugged into a sub port such makes the fact that they claim this fan is portable false advertising I needed a fan for my baby's stroller and definitely picked the wrong one I'm sending it back such a waste of time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this fan
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up during amazon prime day and o my wish I’d have purchased two. Handy little gadget to keep on your desk (or anywhere with a USB hub) for quiet, powerful air circulation. The power of the fan surprised me even on the lowest setting (there are two settings).
customer_reviews.author: DeeAre

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. Can be used with a portable battery when on the go. Can be clipped onto almost anything and swiveled into the desired position. My only complaint is that the plastic seems a little flimsy - probably easy to break it. Tempted to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Nope

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and powerful clip-on fan!
customer_reviews.text: Am quite impressed so far with this little fan. Can clip it on wherever needed and it produces a very nice air flow without having to cool the entire room. Also like the idea that it isn’t rechargeable, as I have purchased some products which do not hold a charge for very long. Excellent personal fan!!
customer_reviews.author: ddn07

customer_reviews.title: Heavy (for its size) but poweful (for its size)
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this four stars simply because of the bulk/weight: this fan is not suitable to clip on to a laptop, which is why I purchased it. There is a part [which is, I see now, ambiguously worded] of the product description which had seemed to claim that. However, it is now living on a cabinet door in our tiny little galley kitchen, which has neither window nor AC. This little fan creates just enough breeze to make doing dishes more bearable. That's worth 4 stars, even though I have to now purchase a second fan for the original intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Just go ahead and buy a couple...
customer_reviews.text: On its high setting, this fan can kick out a decent breeze for its size. The low setting is pretty quiet, and the unit, due to its size, can be used in a variety of work spaces. The clip can double as a base, and you can angle the thing in just about any direction. While a little too bulky to take on the go, this product is ideal for someone who has a limited amount of room on their computer desk.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Great mini fan for a computer desk
customer_reviews.text: My hand gets really hot in my apartment so I needed a small personal fan for my desk. This fan is great, feels very cools and powerful. It can even clip on my shelves on my desk but I have enough room to keep it by my mouse. Worth every cent of the $20 I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I got this USB fan because I needed a solution to keep our infant cool in a rear facing car seat. There are no direct blowing vents in the back seat and he would get so hot in there even with the AC on. Fortunately most newer vehicles are now being equipped with usb ports on the rear console, so picked up a USB extension cable and was able to set this up with relative ease. The assembly is a little on the heavy side, but it blows very quietly and with multiple speed settings it is perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Casas

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the design.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a quiet fan for the office. It arrived well packaged. I'm very impressed with the design of the fan; specifically it is designed to be used as either a stand up fan (the bottom of the clip has small feet on it) or a fan you can clip on to something. The low setting is barely noticeable and the high setting is much quieter than other fans I've owned. It generates a good amount of air on either setting. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Delebreau

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using it for almost 2 years and I LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this product for almost 2 years and we love it. We use it on our car connected to the USB port for our kid on his rear facing car seat. And when we need to use it outside the car, we connect it to a power bank.
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Ma Cantu Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Key nice Fan
customer_reviews.text: Love my key keynice. Fits my needs in all ways. Quiet 2 speeds, I can clip it so it faces whatever direction I need it .just love it. I would recommend this fan to any one who likes a quiet fan .
customer_reviews.author: paula tunder

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet at the low setting
customer_reviews.text: At the high setting it's noisier but not terrible. I have it clipped to my bedside table and the low setting is great. It's easy to rotate to redirect the air flow. I'm using it with a power adapter, not USB
customer_reviews.author: Hagsrus

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this fan !!! It rotates, it has 2 speed settings, it clips onto the side of your desk to be aimed at your top area of your body, or you can clip it upside down & aim it at your lower legs/body area -- VERY versatile & I plan to buy an extra one in case I wear this one out because I have it running all day at my desk at work !!!!
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: This little fan is amazing on the second speed
customer_reviews.text: This little fan is amazing on the second speed. For me, I am in a bedroom with no air conditioning or vents for the summer. This little fan has been a lifesaver. The first speed is so light that you can't feel anything. The cord that mine came with was black instead of white. Overall, I am super happy with this purchase! Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Chen

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a small, versatile, yet powerful fan, you've found it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little fans. Purchased 2 of them to be run off of portable power devices. Even on highthe sound isn't bad (I prefer a bit of sound, it helps me sleep) Has a HIGH and a LOW, and both work fine. Can sit anywhere you place it, or it can clip on with a strong clip. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RealRichRay

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Love this little fan! It is super quiet! I thought it would run when not plugged in but that's not the case. It doesn't charge, it only operates when plugged in by USB so it's not as convenient as I thought. I love how you can rotate it! I have it next to my bed and can sleep with it on all night
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: KEYNICE USB Clip Desk Personal Fan Works Perfectly in My RV
customer_reviews.text: Loving this USB clip fan in my RV. Works on 12 volt and just what I needed when dry camping. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Kuebler

customer_reviews.title: It's a basic USB powered fan that does what I need to do
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic USB powered fan that does what I need to do. I use it to cool some electronics in my garage that power my Christmas/Holiday lights. Those are sitting on a shelf so it was a simple matter of clipping the fan to the ledge, plugging it into a 5V USB power brick and off it does. My only slight gripe is that it doesn't have much vibration dampening which can make the shelf rattle a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Soderstrom

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong enough air flow!
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can plug it into a USB port, but it actually doesn't put out a lot of air. I bought it to put on my forklift at work. I can barely feel any air. A little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Whisper quiet with decent airflow. Will be camping in Florida in a couple weeks so will see how it stands up to running all night, every night for a week. Nice big clip goes on handle of yeti 500x. Pulls 0 watts on low. 2 on high.
customer_reviews.author: CHopkins

customer_reviews.title: Adaptable and useful
customer_reviews.text: I use mine clipped to a bedside bookcase to blow just enough air across my face to offer relief on a hot night. It's really quiet, relatively unobtrusive, and barely uses electricity. My only complaint is that I'll probably have few repair options when a component eventually fails, as so much of this device is plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah Z Appleton

customer_reviews.title: Great air movement for the small size.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fan. Power went out a few months ago and the fan ran great off of a cell phone battery USB backup. Would definitely buy again. Just the right amount of white noise from the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Hookdriver

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great little fan. I love the clip and the fact that it also sits flat on my desk. Really quiet, video shows high setting, then off, then low setting. Good airflow.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great little desk usb fan
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the turquoise clip on fan - it's great and has 2 speeds. It clips on to my computer stand and allows for pivoting and perfect placement of wind.
customer_reviews.author: amazongirl

customer_reviews.title: It works fine. I like that it has 2 speeds available ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two of these for the office, one for me, and one for a co-worker. It works fine. I like that it has 2 speeds available and that you have the choice to just set it on the desk or even better to clip it to a lip of the desk or hutch. The angle is adjustable, so that's a help as well. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SimplifyLife

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is very low quality, not rigid at all. The cage around the blades was very squishy and soft. I put it right back in the box and sent it back. No way to plug into the wall either, ONLY usb
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Good for keeping an aquarium cool
customer_reviews.text: It’s summer and I keep shrimp, which are a cool water species. Purchased two of theses things to keep the temperature low (76-78 cuz I also have guppies) in my tanks so that I don’t need to run AC all the time which can be very expensive. My aquariums are on a rack so I got a dual USB charger. Works pretty well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlit cat

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the car
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for back seat of my car which gets hot for the kids. They LOVE it. It also helps with motion sickness. I would give 5 stars but the questions in writing review about battery life confused me. I wasn't aware these had a battery.
customer_reviews.author: iluvoinkrs

customer_reviews.title: Get It, You Won't Be Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: There isn't anything that I don't like about it. Product is Better than I expected. Very sturdy, lightweight, great color & size, 2 perfect fan speeds. It can sit on a surface or be clipped to something. Absolutely Love It! I thought Hot Flashes were Over about 5 years ago. Well, with my new fan, they are now!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fan for desk and travel
customer_reviews.text: I love this little fan! I got for my desk at work, back in BC - the time Before Corona - when I actually went to an office. Now I can use it wherever I work from - my home office, the patio, or the living room. And since it’s so small and lightweight, it easily slips into my backpack for traveling and works great on a nightstand when just a little extra air movement or noise is needed to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Not a ton of air flow
customer_reviews.text: If you're using this at work on your desk and you're able to have it really close to your face, then this will work. When you're further than 6" away you can't feel any breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Kran515

customer_reviews.title: weak sauce
customer_reviews.text: Not very powerful at all. Idk how people think this fan moves a lot of air, but as far as I’m concerned I think a lady bug sneezing would be better at cooling you off than this thing.
customer_reviews.author: TaDow

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for camping and works great powered by a USB battery bank for tent sleeping on hot nights but can be used for many things
customer_reviews.author: cadetkec

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for campers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use in a camper. It is really quiet and moves a lot of air on even the low setting. I like that the clamp is also a base for putting on a table.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great for a desk.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Quiet, easy to set up, and perfect for a desk.
customer_reviews.author: Whyme?

customer_reviews.title: Quiet versatile little fan
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color. I bought this to have some light background noise for when I sleep. The high setting is perfect for that. The low setting is almost silent. Feels a little cheap but has worked well in the month that I've had it. Can be angled lots of different ways. Sometimes I aim it on my laundry to help it dry faster. The clip is sturdy enough. Wish the power cord was a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Green

customer_reviews.title: Light sipper of power, quiet.  Nice fan.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for use while camping in the back of my truck. Was looking for something I can clip to various surfaces or be self standing, as well as plug into my goalzero's usb port and have low power consumption to circulate the air all night. On low setting, the goalzero is reading 1 watt of consumption, and at high setting, it's reading 2 watts. Initial impressions look good, if the review is not updated later, that means I'm a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is perfect for when I workout, shower, and get to my desk, only to realize I’m still sweating. It cools me off quickly, and quietly. The two speeds are really all you need. The clip works great and doubles as a sturdy stand. Awesome deal.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Working on a new version
customer_reviews.text: Hopeful to use for white noise. Barely any made. Let alone air. Plugged in always never used batteries. Used in Georgia so hot all the time. Waste of money UPDATE.. was contacted by seller to resolve the issues. Very helpful and nice and are looking into a more improved and better model on their end.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gerwig

customer_reviews.title: Saved us 300 bicks
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a fridge fan placed in back to cool the hot area. Provides a path for heat to escape to the roof vent. Normal RV fridge works on propane or elect . Unlike residential one. This little fan works
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected. Bought it for RV but use it in bedroom. Thinking about buying another so I don't have to move it back and forth. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: EZ Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is a great fan. I just wish I would have made sure it was able to charge so it wouldn't always have to be plugged up to the computer. It is a quiet, powerful fan though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: The fan is compact although on high speed it delivers a strong air flow. I looked for a fan that advertised "quiet operation" and am very satisfied with this product. The clip is strong and the cords length is sufficient. Amazon reviews ask that you include what you like best and least with the product you purchased. I can usually find something for the "least liked" comment, although with this purchase I am pleased to say that I am not disappointed nor do I have a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeBoxSister

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to attach to the elliptical at the gym because it is too hot in there. I could not get through my workout without it! Everyone at the gym notices it and envies it!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Gump

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, quiet
customer_reviews.text: Virtually silent on low, higher setting more noticeable but not intrusive for sleeping at night. Stands well on table, clips firmly on doors and doorframes.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwijam

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice little fan for a inexpensive price. I am wheelchair bound and use it clipped to my headrest for the extra hot days. Fan is quiet and has 2 speeds, even the low speed still has decent movement.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

product_meta.title: KEYNICE USB Desk Fan, 4 Inch Table Fans, Mini Clip on Fan, Portable Cooling Fan with 2 Speed, USB Powered Stroller Fan, 360° Rotate USB Fan, Personal Quiet Electric Fan for Home Office Camping- Black
feature_bullets: Clip and table desk type, perfect fan for the office, home, dorm, study, library, games room
It is extremely compact, its size is about 8.1 x 7.8 x 4.2 inches, and the usb cable length is about 1.5 meters
With quiet operation, you can keep this by your bedside and sleep comfortably without the noise bothering you
4 inch blade and 6 inch frame saves your desk space; adjust the direction of the wind with 360° up and down, left and right adjustment, you can enjoy the cool wind from any directions
Note: This fan just powered by USB, it needs plug in usb to use, connects to any PC/laptop via USB or can connect to a AC port with a USB AC adapter( not include)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,530 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
